SIMS Help

     

Recording lunches

Recording pupils lunch-time preferences

Record Lunches requires a Dinner Money licence. Click here to learn more.

Opening Record Lunches

  1. Open the Menu.
  2. Use the Menu Search to find the Class Log.
  3. Choose your class
  4. Click Record Lunches on the toolbar.

To enter the same lunch options for multiple pupils.

  1. Select one or more pupils by clicking their image.
  2. Click Flood Fill Lunches on the toolbar.
